plot: Off-screen, Jake reflects on radio waves. Later he turns radios to a frequency that delivers static. Desperation sends Lucy on a solo expedition to find Calvin; once she does, he offers a bargain. Amelia confronts Calvin's mother, while Martin searches for Lucy, with increasing anger. In a California wilderness, a killer importunes Heaven then happens upon a wounded man who tried suicide. On a drive, the radio signal gets clearer.—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Lucy has tracked down Calvin, and having injured him has the upper hand in him telling her where he's hidden Amelia. But Calvin may be able to use Amelia and Lucy's friendship with Martin to get what he really wants. Meanwhile, Martin, following Jake's lead, learns the connection the Friedman family has with Calvin, and tries to use that connection to find Amelia. Based on their actions, Jake and Amelia are aware that "they" are coming, but they may be helpless to stop "them". And Ortiz is in the Arizona desert trying to find an answer from God in what to do. His encounter with an injured pediatric surgeon who wants Ortiz to kill him provides him with at least a partial answer to his question.—Huggo
